components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: *+{color:red}baseURL{color}+* property is not working in android application. As a result of it, my application is unable to render/ show styles and images stored at local paths.
fields.summary: baseUrl not working: Android Marshmallow and Oreo
fields.environment:
# Appcelerator Studio: 4.9.0.201705302345
# operating system: macOS Sierra: 10.12.5
# Android installed API and SDK tools: Android 8.0.0 (API 26)
# Titanium SDK : 6.1.1 & 6.2.0

comments.body: Thank you for reporting the two issues! Like for the other one, please provide a reproducible test-case and error-logs first, thank you!

The test-case provided won't help to reproduce the issue, you will need to provide a test-case that can be dropped into a project, including your assets. If you can, just upload a test-project and we come back to you asap.

Hello, Please provide a sample code that can be dropped into a project, including your assets. If you can, just upload a test-project and we come back to you asap. Or else we will be closing this ticket. Thanks.
This issue was written up here: [TIMOB-26848]
